SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (
ORDER BY B.post_sq
ORDER BY B.post_category_st
ORDER BY B.post_title
ORDER BY B.post_sub_title
ORDER BY B.post_sq
ASC
ASC
DESC
) RNUM, B.post_sq, B.img_sq,
(SELECT c.file_stre_cours || '/' || c.stre_file_nm FROM comtnfiledetail c WHERE atch_file_id = B.img_sq AND file_cn = 'M') AS imgSrc,
B.post_dt, B.post_category_st, B.post_title, B.post_sub_title, B.post_ctt, B.post_fl FROM ADMIN_POST B
) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex}
SELECT COUNT (*) CNT FROM ADMIN_POST B

SELECT a.post_sq, a.img_sq, (SELECT b.file_stre_cours || '/' || b.stre_file_nm FROM comtnfiledetail b WHERE b.atch_file_id = a.img_sq AND file_cn='D') AS imgSrc, a.post_dt, a.post_category_st, a.post_title, a.post_sub_title, a.post_ctt, a.post_fl FROM ADMIN_POST a
SUBSTR(a.post_sq, 5) IN ( SELECT MIN(SUBSTR(b.post_sq, 5)) FROM ADMIN_POST b WHERE SUBSTR(b.post_sq, 5) > #{postId} AND b.post_category_st = #{postCategorySt} )
SUBSTR(a.post_sq, 5) IN ( SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(b.post_sq, 5)) FROM ADMIN_POST b WHERE SUBSTR(b.post_sq, 5) < #{postId} AND b.post_category_st = #{postCategorySt} )
